comprehensive_overview: Numba is an open-source just-in-time (JIT) compiler that translates a subset of Python and NumPy code into fast machine code. It is designed to seamlessly integrate with the Python scientific software stack and aims to improve the execution speed of numerical algorithms without having to switch to a compiled language.
core_features: Supports both CPU and GPU execution
Easy to use decorators for performance optimization
Dynamic optimization based on function inputs
